text: Kist sitamkortar az on kas, ki ʙa Xudo duruƣ ʙast jo guft, ki ʙa man vahj suda va hol on ki ʙa u hec ciz vahj nasuda ʙud va on kas, ki guft: «Man niz monandi ojote, ki Xudo nozil kardast, nozil xoham kard?» Agar ʙuʙini, on goh, ki in sitamkoron dar sakaroti marg giriftorand va maloika ʙar onho dast kusodaand, ki coni xes ʙerun kuned, imruz sumoro ʙa azoʙe xorkunanda azoʙ mekunand va in ʙa cazoi on ast, ki dar ʙorai Xudo ʙa nohaq suxan megufted va az ojoti U sarpeci mekarded
